title: Hammerwatch 1.3 (Windows)
description:
From readme.txt

I've found it on the net. Working Hammerwatch 1.3 for Windows.
Contains 6 classes and both campaings. I don't know if multi works. For me - not. 0 servers everytime I check. I also don't have anyone for coop. Single works like a charm. I'm currently
deep in Act 3 with my Ranger (easier level). This is some kind of Steam rip. Of course Steam is not needed to run it.

Last but not least, change Your name in-game. :)
I've managed to change it from default (after installing you have "John2s"). I've enclosed my config.xml so you don't need to figure it out. Just open the file in Notepad and edit
Patryk line. I've put my own, real name here but it can be anything.

As for compatibility - works perfectly in Windows 8.1.

Thanks for reading this file.
Enjoy the game.
RadTang


Included files:
Setup.exe (checked it with Comodo - 0 viruses)
Readme.txt
config.xml (to make name change easier - just edit the file and replace)
